# Additive Models

```{r}
model = lm(Hillary ~ ., data=pruned_data)
model_back_aic = step(new_model, direction="backward", k=2, trace=0)
summary(model)$r.squared
summary(model_back_aic)$r.squared
#vif(model)
#which(vif(model) > 5)
```

```{r}
#new_model = lm(Hillary ~ PST040210 +PST120214+AGE775214+SEX255214+RHI525214+RHI625214+POP715213+EDU635213+LFE305213+HSG445213+HSG495213+HSD310213+BZA115213+SBO315207+SBO115207+SBO515207+SBO415207+SBO015207+RTN131207+LND110210+POP060210, data=pruned_data)
```


## Interaction Models

```{r}
big_mod_quad = lm(log(Hillary) ~ .^2 + I(PST045214^2)+I(PST040210^2)+I(PST120214^2)+I(POP010210^2)+I(AGE135214^2)+I(AGE295214^2)+I(AGE775214^2)+I(SEX255214^2)+I(RHI125214^2)+I(RHI225214^2)+I(RHI325214^2)+I(RHI425214^2)+I(RHI525214^2)+I(RHI625214^2)+I(RHI725214^2)+I(RHI825214^2)+I(POP715213^2)+I(POP645213^2)+I(POP815213^2)+I(EDU635213^2)+I(EDU685213^2)+I(VET605213^2)+I(LFE305213^2)+I(HSG010214^2)+I(HSG445213^2)+I(HSG096213^2)+I(HSG495213^2)+I(HSD410213^2)+I(HSD310213^2)+I(INC910213^2)+I(INC110213^2)+I(PVY020213^2)+I(BZA010213^2)+I(BZA110213^2)+I(BZA115213^2)+I(NES010213^2)+I(SBO001207^2)+I(SBO315207^2)+I(SBO115207^2)+I(SBO215207^2)+I(SBO515207^2)+I(SBO415207^2)+I(SBO015207^2)+I(MAN450207^2)+I(WTN220207^2)+I(RTN130207^2)+I(RTN131207^2)+I(AFN120207^2)+I(BPS030214^2)+I(LND110210^2)+I(POP060210^2), data=pruned_data)
```


```{r}
summary(big_mod_quad)$r.squared
plot(fitted(big_mod_quad), resid(big_mod_quad), col = "grey", pch = 20,
     xlab = "Fitted", ylab = "Residuals", main = "Data from Big Mod")
abline(h = 0, col = "darkorange", lwd = 2)

hist(resid(big_mod_quad),
     xlab   = "Residuals",
     main   = "Histogram of Residuals, big_mod_quad",
     col    = "darkorange",
     border = "dodgerblue",
     breaks = 50)
qqnorm(resid(big_mod_quad), main = "Normal Q-Q Plot, big_mod_quad", col = "darkgrey")
```

```{r}
outliers = rstandard(big_mod_quad)[abs(rstandard(big_mod_quad)) > 2]
cooks.distance(big_mod_quad)[names(outliers)] > 4 / length(cooks.distance(big_mod_quad))
```

```{r}
  state = predictors$state_abbreviation[i]

}
```
